00004 EdgeEntry::EdgeEntry(int end, int cap, int flw, EdgeEntry* prev)
00005 {
00006         endPoint = end;
00007         capacity = cap;

00009         nextEdge = NULL;
00010         prevEdge = prev;

00013 
00014 //Push flow on the edge, thus decreasing the flow on the reversed edge
00015 void EdgeEntry::push(int value)
00016 {
00017         flow += value;
00018         reverseEdge->incFlow(-value);
00019 }
00020 
00021 //Set the reverse edge of a specific EdgeEntry to 'other'
00022 void EdgeEntry::setReversed(EdgeEntry* other)
00023 {
00024         reverseEdge = other;
00025 }
00026 
00027 //Check if a given edge is reveresed
00028 bool EdgeEntry::isReverseEdge()
00029 {
00030         int source, target;
00031         target = endPoint;
00032         source = reverseEdge->getEndPoint();
00033         return (source > target);
00034 }
